title.narrative: PROTECTION OP3 - FIGHT AGAINST CHILD EXPLOITATION

description.narrative: By the end of 2020 children victims and children at risk of exploitation have access to appropriate services through coordinated and integrated prevention and protection mechanisms (Medical, psycho- social, and Legal) in targeted regions., which contributes to Access To Justice, Child Protection â€“ General, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Data And Child Protection, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Harnessing Power Of Business And Markets, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Improved and equitable prevention of and response to exploitation of and violence against children in targeted provinces.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By the end of 2020 children victims and children at risk of exploitation have access to appropriate services through coordinatedand integrated prevention and protection mechanisms (Medical, psycho- social, and Legal) in targeted regions.

description.narrative: 876;of target 1,300;child victims of exploitation (487;girls;and 389 boys) received care and support in UNICEF’s;10;focus regions.;Another;905;children benefited from literacy activities and;5,640;children participated in the life skills programme.;An assessment of the;Tourism Code of Conduct;was finalised.;A;National Action Plan on Mica Mining;was finalized jointly by;the Ministries of Mines, of Labour and of Population;and is set to be adopted by the cabinet.;Work on online protection continued, including;the launch of a reporting portal for Madagascar linked to the;Internet Watch Foundation site.;; | Status:Partially met | As-of Date:13/01/2021
